name: Twin Blue Moons
description: Twin Blue Moons is a visual novel telling the story of Maya, a young mage with a wild imagination and an unparalleled ability to get in trouble. Dreams become mingled with magic, memories, and multidimensional dangers in this extraordinary adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space
